SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerRMIInterface, Runnable, Remote
public class Server extends Thread implements ServerRMIInterface
The Server class is responsible for managing the game server. It extends Thread and implements the ServerRMIInterface.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Thread.Builder, Thread.State, Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • playCard

      public Player playCard(int gameId, String username, PlayableCard card, PlayableCard otherCard, AngleOrientation orientation) throws RemoteException, NotExistingPlayerException, InvalidCardPositionException, RequirementsNotMetException, CardTypeMismatchException, AngleAlreadyLinkedException, NotTurnException
      Plays a card.
      Specified by:
      playCard in interface ServerRMIInterface
      Parameters:
      gameId - The ID of the game.
      username - The username of the player.
      card - The card to be played.
      otherCard - The other card.
      orientation - The orientation of the card.
      Returns:
      The player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote error occurs.
      NotExistingPlayerException - If the player does not exist.
      InvalidCardPositionException - If the card position is invalid.
      RequirementsNotMetException - If the requirements are not met.
      CardTypeMismatchException - If the card type is mismatched.
      AngleAlreadyLinkedException - If the angle is already linked.
      NotTurnException - If it is not the player's turn.

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(int gameId, String username, CardType cardType, DrawPosition drawPosition) throws RemoteException, NotTurnException, NotExistingPlayerException, AlreadyThreeCardsInHandException, DeckIsEmptyException
      Draws a card.
      Specified by:
      drawCard in interface ServerRMIInterface
      Parameters:
      gameId - The ID of the game.
      username - The username of the player.
      cardType - The type of the card.
      drawPosition - The position of the draw.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote error occurs.
      NotTurnException - If it is not the player's turn.
      NotExistingPlayerException - If the player does not exist.
      AlreadyThreeCardsInHandException - If there are already three cards in hand.
      DeckIsEmptyException - If the deck is empty.
